amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the establishment of the Small Business Borrower Assistance Program which is intended to create a fund for 7(a) loan borrowers to use if they need help paying the principal or interest payments of their small business loans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 111-508 to authorize the establishment of the Small Business Borrower Assistance Program which will create a fund for 7(a) loan borrowers to use if they need help paying the principal or interest payments of their small business loans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
